mapper.select: select airway.airway_name_start as airportAbbreviate, count(*) as airportAirwaysNum from airway where airway.status=0 group by airportAbbreviate
select id as id,airway_name_start as airwayNameStart , airway_name_end as airwayNameEnd from airway where status=0 limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update airway set airway_name_start=#{airwayNameStart}, airway_name_end=#{airwayNameEnd}, create_time=sysdate(), status=1 where id=#{id}
